We are harem

Where Elegance Meets Empowerment

Step into a world where beauty and ambition align. At Harem, Inc., we empower women to lead with confidence, style, and purpose. Join us in shaping a future defined by elegance and success.

Our story
Our story

Shaping the Legacy

Harem Inc., founded in September 2008, is a Filipino company that operates under the brand names “Strip” and “Browhaus.” The company specializes in body hair removal and reduction services, using modern techniques and FDA-approved products. Their aim is to provide safe, hygienic, and effective solutions while maintaining high international standards.

Our brands

Discover the World of Harem

Explore Harem Inc.’s curated selection of premium brands, each offering unique products designed to elevate your style and experience.

Ministry of waxing

Strip Philippines

Championing a passion for innovation and an eye for sassy, fun interiors, STRIP: Ministry of Waxing has rocked the world of waxing. From our boutiques in Shanghai to Bangkok, our pioneering HSQ mantra, symbolizes our devotion to the Holy Trinity of Waxing: Hygiene, Speed and Quality.
Read more
The brow salon

Browhaus

Browhaus is a premier beauty destination specializing in brow grooming and design. Known for its expert techniques and personalized services, Browhaus combines artistry with skincare to enhance your natural beauty. With a focus on creating the perfect arches and maintaining healthy brows, each visit promises a luxurious and transformative experience. Discover the art of brows at Browhaus and elevate your beauty routine.
Read more
Testimonials

What our partners say about us

I’ve been a loyal customer of Strip Manila for over a year now, and I can honestly say it’s the best waxing experience I’ve ever had! The staff is incredibly professional, friendly, and always makes me feel comfortable. The salon is clean, and the ambiance is relaxing. They use high-quality products that are gentle on my sensitive skin, leaving me smooth and hair-free without any irritation. I love how meticulous and quick the technicians are, and I always walk out feeling pampered. I highly recommend Strip Manila to anyone looking for a top-notch waxing experience!

Maria Dela Cruz
Accounting Officer at Harem

I’ve been with Harem Inc. for over three years now, and the experience has been nothing short of amazing. The company fosters an inclusive and dynamic work culture that encourages creativity and innovation. As a Marketing Manager, I have had the opportunity to lead exciting projects and collaborate with a talented team that is passionate about our mission. The leadership is transparent, supportive, and always open to new ideas. If you’re looking for a place to grow professionally while contributing to something impactful, Harem Inc. is the place to be!

James Reid
Marketing Manager at Harem Inc.

News

Insightful Reads

Dive into Insightful Reads, where every article and blog is a journey of discovery, designed to ignite curiosity and expand your perspective.

Harem Inc. Celebrates Prestigious Industry Awards for Excellence in Business and Innovation The year 2019 marks our 11th year Anniversary since the business was established way back 2008 by its now Managing Director, Ms. Roberta Abad-Estacion. HAREM is the franchise holder of STRIP Ministry of Waxing and Browhaus in which it has been the leader in providing beauty and hair removal services since then. Having grown to a 13 plus and growing team, the business’s success has been built on trust, passion, competence, commitment, and professionalism.
